ygData.subject: +STR Items
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, been /auctioning my little Bardic lungs out in every zone from E Karana to Freeport (my current mail runs).  Nobody seems to have any Golden Amber Earrings
ygData.messageBody:
OK, been /auctioning my little Bardic lungs out in every zone from
E Karana to Freeport (my current mail runs). Nobody seems to have any
Golden Amber Earrings to sell.

Being a wimpy Wood Elf trying to wear heavy Bronze, I'm on a quest for
items to increase my STR. I've got a purity belt and a spiked collar.
I thought the Golden Amber Earrings would be easy enough to find, but
not so far...

One problem is I don't know where these come from. Are they loot? Are
they jewelcraft? My normal modus operandi is to wander over to wherever
the loot comes from and /auction there...

Does anyone have any better suggestions for +str items? And if so, where do
they come from and what do they usually sell for?

Thanks in advance,

- Luvas of Fennin Ro.
